Articles.Content: When you click on the orbit path beyond the next planned manuvre, there is a popup option to warp to next node.  I believe this is a stock feature, is there a way to keybind this action or an easier way to activate it?
Green button on the navball near the red one to cancel the maneuver.

:: In my best R Lee Eremy voice ::

Holy lovenuts! You mean to tell me that was there the whole time!

Well no, not the whole time. You had to upgrade the tracking station and/or mission control for it.

And it was added relatively recently, like 1.6 or something.

1 minute ago, Superfluous J said:

Well no, not the whole time. You had to upgrade the tracking station and/or mission control for it.

And it was added relatively recently, like 1.6 or something.

That makes me feel better, because I have played this game for years and never realized you could click that. 

The other thing I wonder about, on the map screen, if you mouse to the top edge there is a menu for toggling all the different vessel types. Can you make it so that does not auto hide?

55 minutes ago, eberkain said:

on the map screen, if you mouse to the top edge there is a menu for toggling all the different vessel types. Can you make it so that does not auto hide? 

I believe that's part of upcoming 1.11 update. Or at least there will be a button showing that something is actually there.
